NumericType.description: Numeric information that is assigned or is determined by calculation, counting, or sequencing. It does not require a unit of quantity or unit of measure.
NumericType.title: NumericType

format.description: Whether the number is an integer, decimal, real number or percentage.
format.title: format

PeriodType.description: A class to describe a period of time.
PeriodType.title: PeriodType

endDate.description: The date on which this period ends.
endDate.title: endDate

startDate.description: The date on which this period begins.
startDate.title: startDate

PartyIdentificationType.description: A class to define an identifier for a party.
PartyIdentificationType.title: PartyIdentificationType

PartyNameType.description: A class for defining the name of a party.
PartyNameType.title: PartyNameType

ContactType.description: A class to describe a contactable person or department in an organization.
ContactType.title: ContactType

electronicMail.description: The primary email address of this contact.
electronicMail.title: electronicMail

telephone.description: The primary telephone number of this contact.
telephone.title: telephone

ItemIdentificationType.description: A class for assigning identifying information to an item.
ItemIdentificationType.title: ItemIdentificationType

ItemType.description: A class to describe an item of trade. It includes a generic description applicable to all examples of the item together with optional subsidiary descriptions of any number of actual instances of the type.
ItemType.title: ItemType

additionalInformation.description: Further details regarding this item (e.g., the URL of a relevant web page).
additionalInformation.title: additionalInformation

standardItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned according to a standard system.
standardItemIdentification.title: standardItemIdentification

name.description: A short name optionally given to this item, such as a name from a catalogue, as distinct from a description.
name.title: name

commodityClassification.description: A classification of this item according to a specific system for classifying commodities.
commodityClassification.title: commodityClassification

additionalItemProperty.description: An additional property of this item.
additionalItemProperty.title: additionalItemProperty

sellersItemIdentification.description: Identifying information for this item, assigned by the seller.
sellersItemIdentification.title: sellersItemIdentification

InvoiceLineType.description: A class to define a line in an Invoice.
InvoiceLineType.title: InvoiceLineType

lineExtensionAmount.description: The total amount for this invoice line, including allowance charges but net of taxes.
lineExtensionAmount.title: lineExtensionAmount

note.description: Free-form text conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.
note.title: note

item.description: The item associated with this invoice line.
item.title: item

accountingCost.description: The buyer's accounting cost centre for this invoice line, expressed as text.
accountingCost.title: accountingCost

invoicePeriod.description: An invoice period to which this invoice line applies.
invoicePeriod.title: invoicePeriod

price.description: The price of the item associated with this invoice line.
price.title: price

taxTotal.description: A total amount of taxes of a particular kind applicable to this invoice line.
taxTotal.title: taxTotal

documentReference.description: A reference to a document associated with this invoice line.
documentReference.title: documentReference

id.description: An identifier for this invoice line.
id.title: id

invoicedQuantity.description: The quantity (of items) on this invoice line.
invoicedQuantity.title: invoicedQuantity

allowanceCharge.description: An allowance or charge associated with this invoice line.
allowanceCharge.title: allowanceCharge

TaxSubtotalType.description: A class to define the subtotal for a particular tax category within a particular taxation scheme, such as standard rate within VAT.
TaxSubtotalType.title: TaxSubtotalType

taxableAmount.description: The net amount to which the tax percent (rate) is applied to calculate the tax amount.
taxableAmount.title: taxableAmount

taxAmount.description: The amount of this tax subtotal.
taxAmount.title: taxAmount

taxCategory.description: The tax category applicable to this subtotal.
taxCategory.title: taxCategory

AddressLineType.description: A class to define an unstructured address line.
AddressLineType.title: AddressLineType

line.description: An address line expressed as unstructured text.
line.title: line

ItemPropertyType.description: A class to describe a specific property of an item.
ItemPropertyType.title: ItemPropertyType

name.description: The name of this item property.
name.title: name

value.description: The value of this item property, expressed as text.
value.title: value

FinancialAccountType.description: A class to describe a financial account.
FinancialAccountType.title: FinancialAccountType

financialInstitutionBranch.description: The branch of the financial institution associated with this financial account.
financialInstitutionBranch.title: financialInstitutionBranch

id.description: The identifier for this financial account; the bank account number.
id.title: id

ExternalReferenceType.description: A class to describe an external object, such as a document stored at a remote location.
ExternalReferenceType.title: ExternalReferenceType

uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the external object as an Internet resource.
uri.title: uri

IndicatorType.description: A list of two mutually exclusive Boolean values that express the only possible states of a property.
IndicatorType.title: IndicatorType

UBLExtensionsType.description: A container for all extensions present in the document.
UBLExtensionsType.title: UBLExtensionsType

ublExtension.description: A single extension for private use.
ublExtension.title: ublExtension

OrderReferenceType.description: A class to define a reference to an Order.
OrderReferenceType.title: OrderReferenceType

salesOrderID.description: An identifier for this order reference, assigned by the seller.
salesOrderID.title: salesOrderID

id.description: An identifier for this order reference, assigned by the buyer.
id.title: id

MonetaryTotalType.description: A class to define a monetary total.
MonetaryTotalType.title: MonetaryTotalType

lineExtensionAmount.description: The monetary amount of an extended transaction line, net of tax and settlement discounts, but inclusive of any applicable rounding amount.
lineExtensionAmount.title: lineExtensionAmount

chargeTotalAmount.description: The total monetary amount of all charges.
chargeTotalAmount.title: chargeTotalAmount

taxExclusiveAmount.description: The monetary amount of an extended transaction line, exclusive of taxes.
taxExclusiveAmount.title: taxExclusiveAmount

allowanceTotalAmount.description: The total monetary amount of all allowances.
allowanceTotalAmount.title: allowanceTotalAmount

taxInclusiveAmount.description: The monetary amount including taxes; the sum of payable amount and prepaid amount.
taxInclusiveAmount.title: taxInclusiveAmount

payableAmount.description: The amount of the monetary total to be paid.
payableAmount.title: payableAmount

PartyTaxSchemeType.description: A class to describe a taxation scheme applying to a party.
PartyTaxSchemeType.title: PartyTaxSchemeType

taxLevelCode.description: A code signifying the tax level applicable to the party within this taxation scheme.
taxLevelCode.title: taxLevelCode

companyID.description: An identifier for the party assigned for tax purposes by the taxation authority.
companyID.title: companyID

taxScheme.description: The taxation scheme applicable to the party.
taxScheme.title: taxScheme

UBLExtensionType.description: A single extension for private use.
UBLExtensionType.title: UBLExtensionType

extensionAgencyID.description: An agency that maintains one or more Extensions.
extensionAgencyID.title: extensionAgencyID

name.description: A name for the Extension assigned by the creator of the extension.
name.title: name

extensionReason.description: A description of the reason for the Extension.
extensionReason.title: extensionReason

id.description: An identifier for the Extension assigned by the creator of the extension.
id.title: id

extensionAgencyURI.description: A URI for the Agency that maintains the Extension.
extensionAgencyURI.title: extensionAgencyURI

extensionAgencyName.description: The name of the agency that maintains the Extension.
extensionAgencyName.title: extensionAgencyName

extensionReasonCode.description: A code for reason the Extension is being included.
extensionReasonCode.title: extensionReasonCode

extensionContent.description: The definition of the extension content.
extensionContent.title: extensionContent

DateType.description: One calendar day according the Gregorian calendar.
DateType.title: DateType

PartyType.description: A class to describe an organization, sub-organization, or individual fulfilling a role in a business process.
PartyType.title: PartyType

partyTaxScheme.description: A tax scheme applying to this party.
partyTaxScheme.title: partyTaxScheme

endpointID.description: An identifier for the end point of the routing service (e.g., EAN Location Number, GLN).
endpointID.title: endpointID

partyLegalEntity.description: A description of this party as a legal entity.
partyLegalEntity.title: partyLegalEntity

DeliveryType.description: A class to describe a delivery.
DeliveryType.title: DeliveryType

deliveryParty.description: The party to whom the goods are delivered.
deliveryParty.title: deliveryParty

SupplierPartyType.description: A class to describe a supplier party.
SupplierPartyType.title: SupplierPartyType

sellerContact.description: The primary contact for this supplier party.
sellerContact.title: sellerContact

AttachmentType.description: A class to describe an attached document. An attachment can refer to an external document or be included with the document being exchanged.
AttachmentType.title: AttachmentType

externalReference.description: A reference to an attached document that is external to the document(s) being exchanged.
externalReference.title: externalReference

embeddedDocumentBinaryObject.description: A binary large object containing an attached document.
embeddedDocumentBinaryObject.title: embeddedDocumentBinaryObject

TaxCategoryType.description: A class to describe one of the tax categories within a taxation scheme (e.g., High Rate VAT, Low Rate VAT).
TaxCategoryType.title: TaxCategoryType

taxScheme.description: The taxation scheme within which this tax category is defined.
taxScheme.title: taxScheme

taxExemptionReason.description: The reason for tax being exempted, expressed as text.
taxExemptionReason.title: taxExemptionReason

id.description: An identifier for this tax category.
id.title: id

percent.description: The tax rate for this category, expressed as a percentage.
percent.title: percent

TaxSchemeType.description: A class to describe a taxation scheme (e.g., VAT, State tax, County tax).
TaxSchemeType.title: TaxSchemeType

id.description: An identifier for this taxation scheme.
id.title: id

BranchType.description: A class to describe a branch or a division of an organization.
BranchType.title: BranchType

name.description: The name of this branch or division of an organization.
name.title: name

id.description: An identifier for this branch or division of an organization.
id.title: id

PartyLegalEntityType.description: A class to describe a party as a legal entity.
PartyLegalEntityType.title: PartyLegalEntityType

companyID.description: An identifier for the party as registered within a company registration scheme.
companyID.title: companyID

registrationName.description: The name of the party as registered with the relevant legal authority.
registrationName.title: registrationName

IdentifierType.description: A character string to identify and distinguish uniquely, one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme together with relevant supplementary information.
IdentifierType.title: IdentifierType

schemeDataURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the identification scheme data is     located.
schemeDataURI.title: schemeDataURI

schemeURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the identification scheme is located.
schemeURI.title: schemeURI

schemeName.description: The name of the identification scheme.
schemeName.title: schemeName

schemeAgencyID.description: The identification of the agency that maintains the identification scheme.
schemeAgencyID.title: schemeAgencyID

schemeID.description: The identification of the identification scheme.
schemeID.title: schemeID

schemeVersionID.description: The version of the identification scheme.
schemeVersionID.title: schemeVersionID

schemeAgencyName.description: The name of the agency that maintains the identification scheme.
schemeAgencyName.title: schemeAgencyName

InvoiceType.description: A document used to request payment.
InvoiceType.title: InvoiceType

note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures. This can be notes or other similar information for which the invoice specification does not contain suitable qualified elements such as the terms of agreement for an RCTI.
note.title: note

contractDocumentReference.description: A reference to a contract associated with this document. A business or trading agreement.
contractDocumentReference.title: contractDocumentReference

dueDate.description: The date on which Invoice is due.
dueDate.title: dueDate

taxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.
taxTotal.title: taxTotal

profileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration allowing control of its relation to other documents exchanged as part of the same process.
profileExecutionID.title: profileExecutionID

profileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used. Identifies the DBC profile or business process context in which the transaction appears.
profileID.title: profileID

invoicePeriod.description: A period to which the Invoice applies.
invoicePeriod.title: invoicePeriod

invoiceLine.description: A line describing an invoice item.
invoiceLine.title: invoiceLine

id.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender. An invoice identifier enables positive referencing the document instance for various purposes including referencing between documents that are part of the same process.
id.title: id

issueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued. The date on which the Invoice was created.
issueDate.title: issueDate

accountingSupplierParty.description: The accounting supplier party. The Party responsible for providing goods or services to the Buyer.
accountingSupplierParty.title: accountingSupplierParty

allowanceCharge.description: A discount or charge that applies to a price component.
allowanceCharge.title: allowanceCharge

despatchDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Despatch Advice associated with this document. A Document used to describe the sending of a delivery of Items.
despatchDocumentReference.title: despatchDocumentReference

delivery.description: A delivery associated with this document.
delivery.title: delivery

customizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use. Identifies the specification of content and rules that apply to the transaction. Identifying the customisation/implementation guide/contextualization of the syntax message and its extension that applies to the invoice transaction, enables the receiver to apply the correct validation to the received document as well as to route the document to an appropriate service for processing.
customizationID.title: customizationID

copyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false). A copy indicator is used as part of duplicate detection detailing that this is a copy of a document previously and not a duplicate.
copyIndicator.title: copyIndicator

accountingCustomerParty.description: The accounting customer party. The Party that procures goods or services.
accountingCustomerParty.title: accountingCustomerParty

buyerReference.description: A reference provided by the buyer used for internal routing of the document. Identifies where the Buyer may allocate the relevant transaction in their financial reports.
buyerReference.title: buyerReference

ublExtensions.description: A container for all extensions present in the document.
ublExtensions.title: ublExtensions

receiptDocumentReference.description: A reference to a Receipt Advice associated with this document. A Document used to describe the acceptance of delivery of Items.
receiptDocumentReference.title: receiptDocumentReference

documentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document. For domestic Invoicing this will be Australian Dollars in the majority of cases, but it is possible to use other currencies.
documentCurrencyCode.title: documentCurrencyCode

legalMonetaryTotal.description: The total amount payable on the Invoice, including Allowances, Charges, and Taxes.
legalMonetaryTotal.title: legalMonetaryTotal

ublVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.
ublVersionID.title: ublVersionID

invoiceTypeCode.description: A code signifying the type of the Invoice. The code used must be easily accessible and converted to English in accordance with terminology required by GST legislation.
invoiceTypeCode.title: invoiceTypeCode

orderReference.description: A reference to the Order with which this Invoice is associated. An Order is a Document used to order Items issued by the Buyer. To facilitate Invoice matching an Invoice may contain a reference to the Order that the invoice relates to. An invoice may only reference one Order.
orderReference.title: orderReference

additionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document. A previously issued Invoice.
additionalDocumentReference.title: additionalDocumentReference

payeeParty.description: The payee. The Party that receives the Payment.
payeeParty.title: payeeParty

TextType.description: A character string (i.e. a finite set of characters) generally in the form of words of a language.
TextType.title: TextType

languageLocaleID.description: The identification of the locale of the language.
languageLocaleID.title: languageLocaleID

languageID.description: The identifier of the language used in the content component.
languageID.title: languageID

PaymentMeansType.description: A class to describe a means of payment.
PaymentMeansType.title: PaymentMeansType

paymentMeansCode.description: A code signifying the type of this means of payment.
paymentMeansCode.title: paymentMeansCode

instructionID.description: An identifier for the payment instruction.
instructionID.title: instructionID

id.description: An identifier for this means of payment.
id.title: id

BinaryObjectType.description: A set of finite-length sequences of binary octets.
BinaryObjectType.title: BinaryObjectType

encodingCode.description: Specifies the decoding algorithm of the binary object.
encodingCode.title: encodingCode

filename.description: The filename of the binary object.
filename.title: filename

format.description: The format of the binary content.
format.title: format

characterSetCode.description: The character set of the binary object if the mime type is text.
characterSetCode.title: characterSetCode

uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the binary object is located.
uri.title: uri

mimeCode.description: The mime type of the binary object.
mimeCode.title: mimeCode

CustomerPartyType.description: A class to describe a customer party.
CustomerPartyType.title: CustomerPartyType

QuantityType.description: A counted number of non-monetary units possibly including fractions.
QuantityType.title: QuantityType

unitCodeListAgencyID.description: The identification of the agency that maintains the quantity unit code list
unitCodeListAgencyID.title: unitCodeListAgencyID

unitCodeListAgencyName.description: The name of the agency which maintains the quantity unit code list.
unitCodeListAgencyName.title: unitCodeListAgencyName

AmountType.description: A number of monetary units specified using a given unit of currency.
AmountType.title: AmountType

currencyCodeListVersionID.description: The VersionID of the UN/ECE Rec9 code list.
currencyCodeListVersionID.title: currencyCodeListVersionID

AllowanceChargeType.description: A class to describe information about a charge or discount as applied to a price component.
AllowanceChargeType.title: AllowanceChargeType

amount.description: The monetary amount of this allowance or charge to be applied.
amount.title: amount

allowanceChargeReason.description: The reason for this allowance or charge.
allowanceChargeReason.title: allowanceChargeReason

multiplierFactorNumeric.description: A number by which the base amount is multiplied to calculate the actual amount of this allowance or charge.
multiplierFactorNumeric.title: multiplierFactorNumeric

taxTotal.description: The total of all the taxes applicable to this allowance or charge.
taxTotal.title: taxTotal

baseAmount.description: The monetary amount to which the multiplier factor is applied in calculating the amount of this allowance or charge.
baseAmount.title: baseAmount

chargeIndicator.description: An indicator that this AllowanceCharge describes a charge (true) or a discount (false).
chargeIndicator.title: chargeIndicator

allowanceChargeReasonCode.description: A mutually agreed code signifying the reason for this allowance or charge.
allowanceChargeReasonCode.title: allowanceChargeReasonCode

taxCategory.description: A tax category applicable to this allowance or charge.
taxCategory.title: taxCategory

CountryType.description: A class to describe a country.
CountryType.title: CountryType

CodeType.description: A character string (letters, figures, or symbols) that for brevity and/or language independence may be used to represent or replace a definitive value or text of an attribute together with relevant supplementary information.
CodeType.title: CodeType

listID.description: The identification of a list of codes.
listID.title: listID

listAgencyName.description: The name of the agency that maintains the list of codes.
listAgencyName.title: listAgencyName

listSchemeURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the code list scheme is located.
listSchemeURI.title: listSchemeURI

listURI.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier that identifies where the code list is located.
listURI.title: listURI

name.description: The textual equivalent of the code content component.
name.title: name

languageID.description: The identifier of the language used in the code name.
languageID.title: languageID

listName.description: The name of a list of codes.
listName.title: listName

listAgencyID.description: An agency that maintains one or more lists of codes.
listAgencyID.title: listAgencyID

listVersionID.description: The version of the list of codes.
listVersionID.title: listVersionID

DocumentReferenceType.description: A class to define a reference to a document.
DocumentReferenceType.title: DocumentReferenceType

attachment.description: The referenced document as an attachment to the document from which it is referenced.
attachment.title: attachment

documentType.description: The type of document being referenced, expressed as text.
documentType.title: documentType

id.description: An identifier for the referenced document.
id.title: id

TaxTotalType.description: A class to describe the total tax for a particular taxation scheme.
TaxTotalType.title: TaxTotalType

taxSubtotal.description: One of the subtotals the sum of which equals the total tax amount for a particular taxation scheme.
taxSubtotal.title: taxSubtotal

taxAmount.description: The total tax amount for a particular taxation scheme, e.g., VAT; the sum of the tax subtotals for each tax category within the taxation scheme.
taxAmount.title: taxAmount

AddressType.description: A class to define common information related to an address.
AddressType.title: AddressType

countrySubentity.description: The political or administrative division of a country in which this address is located, such as the name of its county, province, or state, expressed as text.
countrySubentity.title: countrySubentity

country.description: The country in which this address is situated.
country.title: country

cityName.description: The name of a city, town, or village.
cityName.title: cityName

postalZone.description: The postal identifier for this address according to the relevant national postal service, such as a ZIP code or Post Code.
postalZone.title: postalZone

PriceType.description: A class to describe a price, expressed in a data structure containing multiple properties (compare with UnstructuredPrice).
PriceType.title: PriceType

baseQuantity.description: The quantity at which this price applies.
baseQuantity.title: baseQuantity

CommodityClassificationType.description: A class to describe the classification of a commodity.
CommodityClassificationType.title: CommodityClassificationType

itemClassificationCode.description: A code signifying the trade classification of the commodity.
itemClassificationCode.title: itemClassificationCode
